Finnest, Inc | Senior Backend Engineer | Boston, MA | Onsite/Remote - $80k-$175k + Equity

We’re a venture/angel backed FinTech company(finnest.co) building a retail bank for the next generation. We have launched the first Visa® Debit card in the US for teens and kids as young as 8 and focus on empowering the next generation to manage their money within a secure environment with parental controls and learn good money habits. We work with an FDIC insured bank to issue the accounts as well as with other payment services to build a great user experience.

Our team is small, focused, all on-site and we enjoy a good time in the office. Daily MarioKart and Smashbros competitions! We are now expanding our team with a Senior Backend Engineer who has the potential to lead our team in the future, is well experienced with building and maintaining our architecture, and loves to solve all sort of challenges that arise. If you’d like to join us on our journey we’d love to hear from you.

Drop us a line at jobs@finnest.co

More information here https://angel.co/finnestapp/jobs
